properties.description: Inverted form of name. Ex.: Smith, John J.
properties.title: Display Name

properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.htm
properties.title: Role

properties.description: Information in this field is about the original item. For example, in the case of a digitized photograph, <typeOfResource> would apply to the analog original; in born-digital materials, it would apply to the original digital format.
properties.title: Type of Resource

properties.description: Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Enter DOI processing status here, e.g. Forward to cataloger or forward to metadata librarian.
properties.title: DOI Processing Status

properties.description: Enter DOI minting date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: DOI Minting Date

properties.description: Name of the person who last modified this record.
properties.title: Record Modifier Name
